EditProfile.profileCreationFailed: Error in creating profile. Please try again.
EditProfile.accountPrivacyChangeText: In order to create a profile widget you need to have a public account. By clicking continue you change your privacy settings to public.
EditProfile.termAndCondition: I agree to the <termsLink>Terms and Conditions</termsLink> of the Plant-for-the-Planet platform.
EditProfile.termAndConditionError: Please Accept the Terms and Conditions

validationErrors.firstNameInvalid: First name is invalid. It cannot start with a special character, and only these special characters are allowed: space ' . -
validationErrors.lastNameInvalid: Last name is invalid. It cannot start with a special character, and only these special characters are allowed: space ' -
validationErrors.nameInvalid: Name is invalid. Only these special characters are allowed: space . , ' & ( ) ! -
validationErrors.addressInvalid: Address is invalid. Only these special characters are allowed: space . , # - /
validationErrors.cityInvalid: City is invalid. Only letters and these special characters are allowed: space . , ( ) -

customiseProfileFields.publicProfileText: By making your profile public, you can choose to share your information and connect with others.
customiseProfileFields.leaderboardTooltipText: The leaderboard shows all contributions others have made to your profile. This could be trees gifted to you or donations that were made by people while visiting your profile. By turning this on, you will allow anyone on the internet to see who made the biggest contributions
